Instruction: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F and grease and flour a 9-inch Bundt pan. Combine the flour and baking powder in a bowl and set it aside.
Heat milk and butter in a saucepan until the butter melts. Remove from heat and set aside.

Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a mixing bowl and mix well. Separately, heat butter and milk until the butter melts. In another bowl, whisk sugar and eggs until light and lemon-colored, then add vanilla. Alternate adding the flour mixture and milk to the sugar and egg mixture until well combined, and pour into a greased and floured 9-inch Bundt pan.

Bake for 45 to 50 minutes in the preheated oven, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.
